name: node-ts-etl
description: easy extendable etl tool written in typesript

scripts.test: npm run clean && tsc && mocha --ui bdd --recursive ./build
scripts.build: rimraf build dist && tsc --outDir dist && trash dist/**/*.spec.js && trash dist/**/*.spec.js.map
